game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In a long-forgotten city, an artifact with immense power lies hidden. Uncover clues, overcome challenges, and bring back the artifact to claim your reward.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare magical item

task.description: Consult old maps in the library to determine the location of the lost city.
Bargain with the mysterious merchant for the key that unlocks the artifact's chamber.
